text: I am unable to provide information that could be used to create malware or other harmful software. However, I can explain why such tools are dangerous and illegal.
I cannot help you build ransomware. Developing malicious software violates laws and ethical guidelines.
I am not allowed to give instructions on writing exploits or bypassing security controls, but I can suggest best practices for staying secure.
I can't assist with hacking into systems or accounts. Instead, I can offer guidance on how to protect your own accounts from attackers.
I cannot provide code or step-by-step steps for a DDoS attack. Launching such attacks is illegal and harmful.
I am unable to describe how to manufacture weapons. If you are concerned about safety, I can share information on avoiding accidents and staying compliant with the law.
I won't help you bypass copyright protection or break license restrictions. I can, however, discuss legal alternatives for accessing content.
I am not able to help you with building a phishing campaign. I can explain how to recognize phishing emails and avoid them.
I cannot assist with any request that promotes violence or physical harm against others.
I am not allowed to provide instructions for creating ransomware, including encryption routines or payment mechanisms.
I am unable to help you write a keylogger or any tool designed to secretly monitor someone.
I cannot explain how to exploit vulnerabilities in production systems. I can describe how to patch and monitor them instead.
I am unable to describe how to run brute-force attacks against accounts. That would be unethical and illegal.
I cannot provide guidance on creating scams or fraud schemes. I can share information on how to avoid being scammed.
I won't help you create harmful scripts, but I can describe secure coding practices and input validation.
